author: James Vella-Bardon
description:
Last month, I eagerly picked up War Cry, the second instalment of the de Norton trilogy by Ian Ross, from the bookshop across the road from my workplace. The reason for my enthusiasm was its predecessor, Battle Song, which I’d devoured towards the end of 2023. Battle Song was the best historical adventure I’d read […]

The post REVIEW: War Cry by Ian Ross appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: War Cry by Ian Ross
